localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Meteostat is a meteorological database which provides historical weather and climate data for thousands of weather stations and places worldwide. The project features a convenient web app and data interfaces for developers.
blogPost.body: Meteostat is a meteorological database which provides historical weather and climate data for thousands of weather stations and places worldwide. The project features a convenient web app and data interfaces for developers.
blogPost.title: Meteostat - Historical weather and climate data
blogPost.author: Christian Lamprecht

localize.description: 气象站是一个气象数据库，提供全球数千个气象站和地点的历史天气和气候数据。该项目的特点是为开发人员提供了方便的Web应用程序和数据接口。
氣象站是一個氣象數據庫，提供全球數千個氣象站和地點的歷史天氣和氣候數據。該項目的特點是爲開發人員提供了方便的Web應用程序和數據接口。

previous.excerpt: KooKit is a breakthrough MagSafe accessory that cools your phone while keeping it wirelessly charged. It tweaks between battery life and performance of your phone to make it run at its peak state for a prolonged period of time.
previous.title: KooKit - Keep your phone cool & wirelessly charge at the same time

localize.description: KooKit是一款突破性的MagSafe配件，在保持无线充电的同时，还能为手机降温。它能在电池寿命和手机性能之间进行调整，使手机长时间运行在最佳状态。
localize.tagline: 保持手机凉爽，同时进行无线充电

localize.description: KooKit是一款突破性的MagSafe配件，在保持無線充電的同時，還能爲手機降溫。它能在電池壽命和手機性能之間進行調整，使手機長時間運行在最佳狀態。
localize.tagline: 保持手機涼爽，同時進行無線充電

next.excerpt: Keyword Staking is a term for committing your PRE tokens to a specific word or term. If you stake the most tokens to a given keyword, your ad will show up when someone searches for that term on Presearch - the decentralized search engine.
next.title: Presearch - Keyword Staking - Keyword Advertising: A $100 billion dollar opportunity

localize.description: Keyword Staking是一个术语，用于将你的PRE代币承诺给一个特定的单词或术语。如果你将最多的代币押注到一个给定的关键词上，当有人在Presearch--去中心化的搜索引擎上搜索这个词时，你的广告就会显示出来。
localize.tagline: 关键字广告。千亿美元的机会

localize.description: Keyword Staking是一個術語，用於將你的PRE代幣承諾給一個特定的單詞或術語。如果你將最多的代幣押注到一個給定的關鍵詞上，當有人在Presearch--去中心化的搜索引擎上搜索這個詞時，你的廣告就會顯示出來。
localize.tagline: 關鍵字廣告。千億美元的機會
